class.name: MultivariateMatrixFunction

javadoc.text: An interface representing a multivariate matrix function.
Compute the value for the function at the given point.
javadoc.param: point point at which the function must be evaluated
javadoc.return: function value for the given point
javadoc.exception: IllegalArgumentException if point's dimension is wrong
